title: Relativity, Cosmology, and Modern Physics

vocab.definition: Geometric warping of four-dimensional spacetime by mass and energy
Rapid exponential expansion of universe in first fraction of second
Hypothesis that our universe is one of many possible universes
Theoretical radiation predicted to be emitted by black holes
Theoretical framework attempting to unify quantum mechanics and general relativity

teachingNotes: Explore frontiers of theoretical physics and cosmology. Discuss ongoing research and unsolved problems in physics.
